thread.title: Meet The Daily Show's Hasan Minhaj at NU Hotel Brooklyn
thread.title_full: Meet The Daily Show's Hasan Minhaj at NU Hotel Brooklyn

author: Mary Falso
title: Meet The Daily Show's Hasan Minhaj at NU Hotel Brooklyn
text:
NU Hotel Brooklyn, an Independent Collection hotel, welcomes comedian Hasan Minhaj for an intimate meet and greet on October 21 from 7:30 - 9:00 PM at the hotel’s lobby bar Misdemeanor. Honoring the off-Broadway premiere of Minhaj’s first live solo show “Homecoming King,” the event will offer fans, guests and locals the opportunity to interact one-on-one with the comedian while enjoying drink specials and hors d’oeuvres. Hasan Minhaj is a New York-based comedian, actor and writer, a regular correspondent on Comedy Central’s “The Daily Show” and has previously performed on top shows such as “Last Call with Carson Daly” and “Chelsea Lately.” Directed by Greg Walloch and written and performed by Minhaj, “Homecoming King” references the comedian’s experience as a first generation Indian-American and his family’s quest to achieve the American dream. The show will run from October 15 through November 15 at New York’s Cherry Lane Theatre; tickets are available for purchase at homecomingkingshow.com.
NU Hotel Brooklyn is located in the heart of downtown Brooklyn at the intersection of four great Brooklyn neighborhoods. The 93-room lifestyle hotel boasts loft inspired accommodations with some guestrooms featuring murals from local artists and others with hammocks. Guests can enjoy handcrafted cocktails at the hotel’s signature bar, Misdemeanor.
Friends of NU Hotel Brooklyn can use special promotional code “HMNUHOTEL” to purchase discounted tickets to “Homecoming King.” With this code, tickets are $10 for regular seats and $20 for premium seats at http://www.homecomingkingshow.com/ . For more information on NU Hotel and to book a stay, please visit http://www.nuhotelbrooklyn.com . To learn more about the Independent Collection, please visit http://www.independentcollection.com .
